section.p: Qt open source libraries (https://www.qt.io/) available under LGPLv3 (https://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0.en.html) license.
pugixml library (http://pugixml.org). pugixml is Copyright (C) 2006-2018 Arseny Kapoulkine.
The DITA Open Toolkit is located at https://www.dita-ot.org/.
If you are new to DITA, I recommend https://learningdita.com/.
A very helpful DITA users group: https://dita-users.groups.io/g/main.
